ground_truth.name: AgriTechFinance.get_current_trends

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'AgriTechFinance.get_funding_basics', 'description': 'Get basic concepts and common methods of funding for agricultural technology', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'funding_basics', 'description': 'basic concepts and common methods of funding for agricultural technology'}]}, {'name': 'AgriTechFinance.get_case_studies', 'description': 'Get case studies of funding for agricultural technology companies', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'case_studies', 'description': 'case studies of funding for agricultural technology companies'}]}, {'name': 'AgriTechFinance.get_current_trends', 'description': 'Get current trends in funding for the agricultural technology industry', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'current_trends', 'description': 'current trends in funding for the agricultural technology industry'}]}, {'name': 'AgriTechFinance.get_funding_advice', 'description': 'Get funding advice based on a specific agricultural technology project', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'project_description', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'description of the agricultural technology project'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'funding_advice', 'description': 'funding advice based on the project description'}]}]

我是一名农业科技创业者，正在寻找农业科技的融资途径。首先，我想了解农业科技融资的基本概念和常见方式。然后，我想获取一些农业科技企业的融资案例。接着，我想了解当前农业科技行业的融资趋势。最后，基于我的农业科技项目，我希望得到一些融资建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取农业科技融资的基本概念和常见方式
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数是什么?

{'funding_basics': 'Agricultural technology (AgriTech) funding typically involves various methods such as venture capital, government grants, crowdfunding, and partnerships with agricultural cooperatives. Common sources include private investors, angel investors, and specialized AgriTech funds.'}

Common sources include private investors, angel investors, and specialized AgriTech funds.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取一些农业科技企业的融资案例
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?

{'case_studies': '1. Company A raised $10 million in Series A funding from a venture capital firm specializing in AgriTech. 2. Company B secured a $5 million government grant for developing sustainable farming practices. 3. Company C used crowdfunding to raise $2 million from individual investors interested in innovative agricultural solutions.'}
